name: Lift It
description: Lift It is a fresh and dynamic game where you have to train your character in order to gain stats. Every Gym exercise helps gaining a specific stat. Increasing your stats will help you to beat your enemies when travelling from the main island (Gym Island) to the other islands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or newer Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHZ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD4000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated
